prompt_update: You will receive a text. Your task is to continue this text. Just output your new text, nothing else. Here is the text:
initial_story:
The National Police Air Service has shared a video of what it was like flying through Storm Gerrit's heavy winds, in a helicopter.

The footage, which was captured from inside the cockpit, shows the chopper rocking side to side, after being hit by winds of up to 80mph (128km/h).

Posting on X, formerly known as Twitter, the NPAS said "If you think it's windy down there, spare a thought for us up here in our flying washing machine".

The footage was filmed near Lea Valley reservoirs, North London.

Once upon a time, there was a young prince who was very handsome and very brave. He was the son of the king and queen, and he was loved by everyone in the kingdom. One day, the prince went for a walk in the forest, and he came across a beautiful young woman who was lost. The prince helped the young woman find her way home, and they fell in love. They were married and they lived happily ever after.

Once upon a time, there was a young prince who was very handsome and very brave. He was the son of the king and queen, and he was loved by everyone in the kingdom. One day, the prince went for a walk in the forest, and he came across a beautiful young woman who was lost. The prince helped the young woman find her way home, and they fell in love.

But their happiness was short-lived, for the young woman was actually a witch in disguise. She had cast a spell on the prince, and he was now under her control. The witch forced the prince to do her bidding, and she made him steal from the king's treasury and commit other crimes.

The prince was ashamed of what he had done, but he was powerless to resist the witch's magic. Finally, the witch decided to get rid of the prince and take his place as ruler of the kingdom. She cast a spell on the prince, turning him into a frog. The frog was helpless, and the witch threw him into a pond and left him to die.

But the frog was not dead. He was able to swim to the edge of the pond and climb out. He made his way back to the castle, and he found the witch in the throne room, wearing the crown of the kingdom. The frog hopped up to the witch and kissed her on the cheek.

The witch was shocked, and she fell to the floor, dead. The frog transformed back into the prince, and he took his rightful place as ruler of the kingdom. He ruled wisely and justly, and the kingdom was happy and prosperous.

The end.

Once upon a time, there was a young prince who was very handsome and very brave. He was the son of the king and queen, and he was loved by everyone in the kingdom. One day, the prince went for a walk in the forest, and he came across a beautiful young woman who was lost. The prince helped the young woman find her way home, and they fell in love.

But their happiness was short-lived, for the young woman was actually a witch in disguise. She had cast a spell on the prince, and he was now under her control. The witch forced the prince to do her bidding, and she made him steal from the king's treasury and commit other crimes.

The prince was ashamed of what he had done, but he was powerless to resist the witch's magic. Finally, the witch decided to get rid of the prince and take his place as ruler of the kingdom. One day, the prince went for a walk in the forest, and he came across a beautiful young woman who was lost. The prince helped the young woman find her way home, and they fell in love.

But their happiness was short-lived, for the young woman was actually a witch in disguise. She had cast a spell on the prince, and he was now under her control. The witch forced the prince to do her bidding, and she made him steal from the king's treasury and commit other crimes.

The prince was ashamed of what he had done, but he was powerless to resist the witch's magic. Finally, the witch decided to get rid of the prince and take his place as ruler of the kingdom. She cast a spell on the prince, turning him into a frog. The frog was helpless, and the witch threw him into a pond and left him to die.

But the frog was not dead. He was able to swim to the edge of the pond and climb out. He made his way back to the castle, and he found the witch in the throne room, wearing the crown of the kingdom. The frog hopped up to the witch and kissed her on the cheek.

The witch was shocked, and she fell to the floor, dead. The frog transformed back into the prince, and he took his rightful place as ruler of the kingdom. He ruled wisely and justly, and the kingdom was happy and prosperous.

But the prince was not satisfied. He still felt the effects of the witch's spell, and he knew that he would never be truly free of her. He set out on a quest to find a cure for his curse, and he traveled far and wide, searching for a solution.

After many years of searching, the prince finally found a wise old man who knew of a magical potion that could break the witch's spell. The prince took the potion, and he felt the power of the witch's magic leave him. He was finally free of her curse, and he returned to the kingdom to rule in peace.
